terms_and_conditions_validation: You must accept the terms and conditions
terms_and_conditions_content:
Presentation

To facilitate your access to online services, the Digital Government Committee has set up the KHID. KHID allows access to services requiring a higher level of security electronic identification/authentication. The list of partners from KHID is available here: URL link or logo of private sectors/public services

The online service provider you want to connect that defines the level of assurance of identification/authentication required to access its online services(s).

To use KHID, you must (L2):

  • If you are Cambodian, be registered with an Identity card/passport so that your identity data has been verified.
  • If you are a foreigner, be registered with a passport so that your identity data has been verified.

To use KHID, you must (L1):

  • registered with a mobile phone number so that your identity data has been verified.

The KHID is responsible for making the bridge between the Identity Supplier and the Service Provider by generating a unique technical identifier. Thus, following your successful identification/authentication with the Identity card/passport you have chosen, the latter sends your identity data (phone number, full name in Khmer). The KHID then questions the Mobile phone service provider for identification via an OTP code (One-time password) code to check that you exist. If your identification/authentication is validated, the selected identity data may be transmitted from your Service Provider to the Service Provider. You are then connected to the online service of the Service provider.

Access to KHID is free of charge.

Our Responsibilities

We may not be held liable for identity theft or any fraudulent use of KHID. We cannot be held liable for any damage caused by any person Unauthorized using your usernames and passwords. You are reminded that anyone who makes a false declaration for itself, or others shall be liable.

We reserve the right to block your access, without notice or compensation of any kind, in the event of a suspicion of illegal, fraudulent, or contrary to these general conditions of use.

Your Responsibilities

It is up to you to comply with the conditions of use of the identification service and electronic authentication subscribed to your Identity Provider. It belongs to You in particular, never to disclose your login details and passwords, which must remain confidential.

It is up to you to comply with the conditions of use of the service as defined by the Supplier of service. In particular, we recommend that you log out at the end of your navigation.

Quality Of Services

The KHID may be interrupted, without prior notice, in particular for reasons of maintenance, safety, or cases of force majeure. An information message indicating this unavailability may be displayed. The unavailability of the KHID does not entitle you to any compensation.

Contact US

Under this function a user can contact KHID’s Customer Support Center via the available feedback form, or call-in to our hotline number XX XXX XXX.
privacy_and_policy_content:
1. The purpose of this privacy statement is to inform you of how we collect, use, disclose and process the following data and information:
    • Data and personal data relating to you.
    • Information associated with your account.
    • Data and personal data that may related to a third-party individual and is provided by you.
  2. We may request certain types of Data from you in connection with your Use of KHID Materials. Examples of the types of Data which we may request and collect include, but are not limited to:
    • Information related to your account, such as your account number.
    • Information about you from data source(s) approved by us.
    • Your contact information, including your telephone number, full name.
    • Information from your Device including but not limited to your location information, IP address, MAC address, network interfaces, device type and model, and other forms of data from your Device in connection with the Use of KHID.
    • Information relating to the version of the KHID app on your Device or your Use of KHID, including but not limited to information relating to your activities in respect of KHID, the usage of the various functionalities, features or clicks on the KHID, Device permissions such as the permission to push notifications, use location services, use any connectivity services, and other similar information.
  3. We may collect the Data through various technologies including but not limited to:
    • Analytics Tags: Analytics Tags are used by us to analyze the effectiveness of the functionalities and features of KHID and user preferences relating to KHID to improve general user experience. We may use information collected through such analytics tags in combination with your Data (such as transaction history and demographic information) to understand more about the profile of our users.
    • Cookies: Cookies are small data files which are sent to your browser or Device to store and track information about you when you Use KHID. Cookies are also used to improve and maintain the functionality of KHID, and to track information such as the number of users of KHID, their frequency of use, the profile of the users and other similar information relating to the Use of KHID. While these cookies can tell us when you Use KHID, they cannot read data off your hard disk. Not all cookies collect personal data, and you may configure your preferences and settings to reject the use of cookies. However, this may mean you may not be able to take full advantage of KHID, including the features or the functionalities of KHID.
    • Device information: Information relating to your Device such as its model, type, operating system and other technical attributes.
  4. Data collected from you may be used, disclosed and processed by us for any, some or all the following purposes:
    • To assist, process and facilitate your Use of KHID, including registering and creating your account, facilitating your login into your account and your use of any features or functionalities of KHID.
    • To carry out your instructions or respond to any queries, feedback or complaints provided by (or purported to be provided by) you or on your behalf, or otherwise for the purposes of responding to or dealing with your interactions with us.
    • To monitor and track your usage of KHID, to assist us in understanding user behaviors, trends and preferences, and in improving KHID. For the avoidance of doubt, we may also collect, use, disclose and process such Data to create reports and produce statistics regarding the above for record-keeping and reporting or publication purposes (whether internally or externally). Data used in such reports and statistics will be anonymized before publication.
    • To prevent or investigate any fraud, unlawful or criminal activity or omission or misconduct, or cybersecurity incident, via the use of your Account, whether there is any suspicion of the aforementioned, even if the disclosure of such Data may be potentially incriminating.
    • To deal with conflict of interests or investigate complaints in relation to your Account.
    • To contact you or communicate with you on any matters relating to your Use of KHID, including but not limited to the purposes set out above, via email, push notifications or such other forms of communication that we may introduce from time to time depending on the functionality of KHID and your Device.
    • For any other purpose(s) that do not appear above where permissible under any written law.
  5. Regarding Data provided by you or which we have collected as part of the provision of KHID or its features or functionalities:
    • Third parties approved by is to use KHID and its features or functionalities (such as Approved Service Providers)
    • Relevant third-party service providers in connection with the provision of KHID.
    • Law enforcement authorities, investigative bodies, regulatory bodies.
    • For your convenience, we may also display to you Data you had previously supplied us. This will speed up the transaction(s) and save you the trouble of repeating previous submissions. Should such displayed Data be out-of-date, you shall be required to supply the latest Data through the relevant functionality in KHID without delay.
  6. During your Use of KHID Materials, you may provide, or we may collect Data relating to other individuals from you.
    • Notify these individuals (i) that you will be providing their data or personal data to us or through your Use of KHID or its features or functionalities; and (ii) of the purpose for which we will be collecting, using, disclosing and processing their data or personal data, as set out in this Privacy Statement and as notified by us to you from time to time; and (ii) us to collect, use, disclose and process these individuals personal.
    • Obtain the consent from the individuals whose data or personal data are being disclosed, permitting (i) you to disclose the personal data to us or through your use of KHID or its features or functionalities; and (ii) us to collect, use, disclose and process these individuals’ personal data, for the purpose.
  7. Your Data may be stored in servers, systems or devices owned, operated or managed by us, a relevant third-party or any third-party service provider engaged by us or a relevant third-party, or on your Device, and may be used by us (or our third-party service providers) and Approved Service Providers to facilitate your Use of KHID.
  8. You may withdraw your consent to the use and disclosure of Data by us with reasonable notice; however, doing so may prevent proper Use of KHID, or any part thereof and may also result in the cessation of your Use of KHID, or any part thereof. We may retain, use, disclose and process your Data for any of the Purposes set out herein where permitted under any applicable law.
  9. We reserve the right to change, modify or supplement the Privacy Statement at our discretion and at any time, by posting the changed, modified or supplemented Privacy Statement on or through the KHID Website, KHID app, or through such other means as we may deem appropriate. Your continued Use of KHID following the posting of any change, modification or supplement will constitute your acceptance of such change, modification or supplement. If you do not agree to any change, modification or supplement to the Privacy Statement, please do not Use KHID.

reset_password_discontinue_prompt: Are you sure you want to discontinue the reset password process?
